thread.section_title: Intoxalock Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intoxalock | intoxalock.com | 9 of 218
thread.title: Jim Person

author: Jim Person
title: Jim Person
text: Had my unit installed toward the end of November, 2016. Wasn't eligible for a license until the end of December, but the court wanted it installed by Nov. 30. Come December, came to find out that the DMV form I needed to get my D/L back was accidentally omitted from the initial unit's shipping package. The installers had the form by 9:30 the next morning, and I was able to get my D/L from the DMV.
